contents.title: Hello World!
contents.content: Welcome to parity, a numbers puzzle game.

contents.title: How to play
contents.content: All you need to play are the arrow keys.

contents.title: How to play
contents.content: The goal is to get each number on the board to be the same.

contents.title: Yay! You finished!
contents.content: You've beaten every level that currently exists in parity, congratulations! Why don't you go ahead and challenge your friends?
